messages.title: STOP THE TORIES TODAY
messages.content: Say 'NO' to: The 'Dementia Tax' that punishes the elderly and the sick, Cuts to schools that mean less teachers and bigger classes, More privatisation of the NHS and healthcare in crisis.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes the 'Dementia Tax' that punishes the elderly and the sick.
Against cuts to schools that lead to less teachers and bigger classes.
Against further privatisation of the NHS and addressing the healthcare crisis.

issues.education: Cuts to schools mean less teachers and bigger classes.
issues.health: More privatisation of the NHS and healthcare in crisis.

images.caption: STOP THE TORIES TODAY Say 'NO' to: The 'Dementia Tax' that punishes the elderly and the sick, Cuts to schools that mean less teachers and bigger classes, More privatisation of the NHS and healthcare in crisis.
